item.title: Is The AI Job Apocalypse Real Or Overhyped?
item.description: Fears of an AI-driven job apocalypse are everywhere, but the reality inside most organizations is far more complex.

item.title: Christmas Sky: See A ‘Christmas Star,’ A Crescent Moon And Saturn
item.description: On Christmas night, Jupiter will be one of the brightest objects in the sky — and a stand-in for the mythical “Christmas Star.”

item.title: See The Moon And Saturn Dance This Christmas — Here’s When To Look
item.description: On Dec. 25 and 26, a waxing crescent moon will appear close to Saturn in the night sky after sunset, making a beautiful Christmas pairing.

item.title: First Crewed Moon Mission Since 1973 Is ‘Go’ For 2026 — What We Know
item.description: Artemis II will send astronauts around the moon in February-April 2026, marking NASA’s first crewed lunar mission in 53 years and paving the way for l...

item.title: ‘Pluribus’ Season 2 May Take Even Longer Than We Thought
item.description: It was always going to be a long wait for Pluribus season 2, but according to its creator, it's probably longer than we even think.
